definition: to meet by chance/to come across/(of a calendar event) to come along/(of an event) to fall on (a particular day)/to fawn upon
doubly homesick for our dear ones at each festive day (from a poem by Wang Wei 王維|王维[Wang2 Wei2])
pinyin: mei3 feng2 jia1 jie2 bei4 si1 qin1

sentences.english: I am on the night shift every Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢星期三都值夜班。

sentences.english: Interestingly, he is still unable to defeat Grey Wolf in a fist fight except for rare incidences.
sentences.chinese: 每逢拳腳之爭，他都還不必然鬥得過灰太狼咧。

sentences.english: Whenever there was a market day Sitze sent a couple of women messengers to ask him to return home.
sentences.chinese: 每逢集日西則便派幾個婦女捎話叫他回家來。

sentences.english: He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
sentences.chinese: 每逢既望之日他都會去寺廟燒香。

sentences.english: On his day-off Nara looks for trouble in Glass City.
sentences.chinese: 每逢假期，奈良就在格拉斯司迪裏找麻煩。

sentences.english: During the Spring Festival, Chinese families will get together and have dumpling parties.
sentences.chinese: 每逢春節，中國家庭會齊聚一堂喫餃子。

sentences.english: Every qingming day, people not only BaiTianFang, also put on at night.
sentences.chinese: 每逢清明時節，人們不僅白天放，夜間也放。

sentences.english: I always congratulate friends when something goes their way.
sentences.chinese: 每逢我的朋友事事順心的時候我總是祝賀他們。
每逢星期天他總睡懶覺。

sentences.english: Therefore, during the Year of the Goat, as a painter in the painting are many topics.
sentences.chinese: 故每逢羊年，畫家中以此爲題材作畫者甚多。

sentences.english: Every bus arrival, a group of passengers will be well up for.
sentences.chinese: 每逢公車到站，都會湧上一羣搭客的。

sentences.english: The people lay out their mooncakes as an offering to her during Midautumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 每逢中秋，世人都會擺出月餅，供奉嫦娥。

sentences.english: When I laid down to sleep, she waked me.
sentences.chinese: 每逢我躺下來睡覺的時候，她就叫醒我。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, the wild crabapple blossoms filled valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏時節，野生海棠花開滿溝谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, full of wild crabapple valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏時節，野生海棠開滿溝谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: Every goat year, waves of pilgrims come to the Holy Lake. It is really an exceptionally grand occasion.
sentences.chinese: 每逢羊年轉湖的朝聖者人流如潮，盛況空前。

definition: at the Chinese New Year or other festivities
to just happen to coincide with
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
New Year's Day in the lunar calendar
to visit one's friends and relatives
first day of lunar month/New Year's Day/first year in junior middle school
